score: 1 out of 3 people found the following review useful
review: Meg Ryan and Tom Hanks are endearing as two business rivals who unknowingly adore each other in this Nora Ephron hit.  Ryan is utterly charming as bookstore owner Kathleen Kelly, a role that proves the talent of one of Hollywood's most-overlooked actors.  Tom Hanks believably portrays a bookstore magnate.  With an intriguing story and wonderful cast, including the hilarious Jean Stapleton, You've Got Mail is one of the best romantic comedies to date.
